sql-map.name: AdvancesProductIRMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: INSERT INTO ADVANCES_PROD_INTREC (PROD_ID, DEBIT_INT_CHARGED, MIN_DEBITINT_RATE, MAX_DEBITINT_RATE, MIN_DEBITINT_AMT, MAX_DEBITINT_AMT, DEBITINT_CALC_FREQ, DEBITINT_APPL_FREQ, DEBIT_COMP_REQ, DEBITINT_COMP_FREQ, DEBIT_PROD_ROUNDOFF, DEBIT_INT_ROUNDOFF, LAST_INTCALC_DTDEBIT, LAST_INTAPPL_DTDEBIT, PROD_FREQ, UNCLEAR_ADV_INTCHARG, PLR_RATE_APPL, PLR_RATE, PLR_APPL_FROM, PLR_APPL_NEWAC, PLR_APPL_EXISTAC, PLR_APPL_SANCFROM, EOL_APPL, PENAL_APPL, LIMIT_EXPIRY_INT, PENAL_INT_RATE ) VALUES ( #prodId:VARCHAR#, #debitIntCharged:VARCHAR#, #minDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, #maxDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, #minDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, #maxDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, #debitintCalcFreq:NUMERIC#, #debitintApplFreq:NUMERIC#, #debitCompReq:VARCHAR#, #debitintCompFreq:NUMERIC#, #debitProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #debitIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, #lastIntcalcDtdebit:DATE#, #lastIntapplDtdebit:DATE#, #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, #unclearAdvIntcharg:VARCHAR#, #plrRateAppl:VARCHAR#, #plrRate:NUMERIC#, #plrApplFrom:DATE#, #plrApplNewac:VARCHAR#, #plrApplExistac:VARCHAR#, #plrApplSancfrom:DATE#, #eolAppl:VARCHAR#, #penalAppl:VARCHAR#, #limitExpiryInt:VARCHAR#, #penalIntRate:NUMERIC#)

UPDATE ADVANCES_PROD_INTREC SET PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#, DEBIT_INT_CHARGED = #debitIntCharged:VARCHAR#, MIN_DEBITINT_RATE = #minDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, MAX_DEBITINT_RATE = #maxDebitintRate:NUMERIC#, MIN_DEBITINT_AMT = #minDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, MAX_DEBITINT_AMT = #maxDebitintAmt:NUMERIC#, DEBITINT_CALC_FREQ = #debitintCalcFreq:NUMERIC#, DEBITINT_APPL_FREQ = #debitintApplFreq:NUMERIC#, DEBIT_COMP_REQ = #debitCompReq:VARCHAR#, DEBITINT_COMP_FREQ = #debitintCompFreq:NUMERIC#, DEBIT_PROD_ROUNDOFF = #debitProdRoundoff:VARCHAR#, DEBIT_INT_ROUNDOFF = #debitIntRoundoff:VARCHAR#, LAST_INTCALC_DTDEBIT = #lastIntcalcDtdebit:DATE#, LAST_INTAPPL_DTDEBIT = #lastIntapplDtdebit:DATE#, PROD_FREQ = #prodFreq:NUMERIC#, UNCLEAR_ADV_INTCHARG = #unclearAdvIntcharg:VARCHAR#, PLR_RATE_APPL = #plrRateAppl:VARCHAR#, PLR_RATE = #plrRate:NUMERIC#, PLR_APPL_FROM = #plrApplFrom:DATE#, PLR_APPL_NEWAC = #plrApplNewac:VARCHAR#, PLR_APPL_EXISTAC = #plrApplExistac:VARCHAR#, PLR_APPL_SANCFROM = #plrApplSancfrom:DATE#, EOL_APPL = #eolAppl:VARCHAR#, PENAL_APPL = #penalAppl:VARCHAR#, LIMIT_EXPIRY_INT = #limitExpiryInt:VARCHAR#, PENAL_INT_RATE = #penalIntRate:NUMERIC# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId:VARCHAR#
